mapper.insert: insert into review_TB(r_Id, p_Id, m_Id, r_Date, r_Content, r_Rating) values(review_SQ.NEXTVAL, #{p_Id}, #{m_Id}, SYSDATE, #{r_Content}, #{r_Rating})
